entry.title: Aprés Nail Gel-X Extensions - Sculpted Coffin Long
entry.summary:
Vendor: Aprés Nail
Type: Gel System
Price: 29.95

Aprés Nail Gel-X Extensions - Sculpted Coffin Long

  • How can you reinvent the classic French?

    Simple—make it easier and quicker to do. Introducing the French Gel-X tip. Still formulated with our signature soft gel formula, these Gel-X tips have six specially measured and designed smile line grooves, outlining the perfect smile line of your choice. You simply need to pick which smile line you’d like and follow the line with your chosen color gel. And with six different smile line guidelines to choose from, all with varying depths, these tips offer complete versatility and ease in creating a perfect French set. Gone are your worries of symmetrical lines or steady hands. We’ve rolled beautiful extensions and flawless art all into one revolutionary Gel-X tip!

    One box includes 10 sizes, total of 330 pieces. 

    Style: Sculpted
    Shape: Coffin
    Length: Long
entry.s:tag: Aprés French Manicure Gel-X Extension System

entry.title: Aprés Nail - Gel Polish Remover ClipSet of 10
entry.summary:
Vendor: Aprés Nail
Type: Gel System
Price: 5.65

Aprés Nail - Gel Polish Remover Clip Set of 10 

Our Apres Gel Remover Clips are the perfect way to remove your Gel-X tips.

Crafted from sturdy plastic and molded for the best hold, these clips can be used again and again. It’s the perfect way to quickly and efficiently remove gel product without extra waste or hassle.

Simply soak a lint free cotton pad with acetone, place on the nail, and then clip in place with the Gel Remover Clips. After a few minutes, push off the lifted gel with either an orangewood stick or our Apres Gel Remover Tool. If the gel is still intact, simple reapply the cotton pad and Gel Remover Clip for a few more minutes.

entry.title: Aprés Nail - Nail File 100/180 Grit - White Diamond
entry.summary:
Vendor: Aprés Nail
Type: Gel System
Price: 1.43

Aprés Nail - Nail File 100/180 Grit - White Diamond
Our Diamond File is as tough and indestructible as its name. 
  • Nail files are a nail professional’s most trusty tool. And every professional will have a different personal preference on shape and style of their file. 
  • Our white file series offers five different shapes so that you can find the shape that best suits your needs. Made from sturdy white emery board, these files are not only perfect for shaping and filing your Gel-X tips but can also be used on acrylic, hard gel, or natural nails. Buy just one style or all five and complete your nail toolkit!

entry.title: Aprés Nail - Diamond File
entry.summary:
Vendor: Aprés Nail
Type: Gel System
Price: 24.65

Aprés Nail - Diamond File
Our Diamond File is as tough and indestructible as its name. 
  • A fraction of the thickness of most normal files, our Diamond File slips in perfectly around sidewalls and corners, allowing for perfect and detailed filing. While this 120 grit file can easily smooth and shape any tip, it never feels too abrasive or coarse due to its diamond finish. Sanitize-able and reusable, our Diamond File is sure to outshine all other competition in no time!

entry.title: Aprés Nail Gel-X Nail Extensions - Peel Off Liquid Mask 15 mL
entry.summary:
Vendor: Aprés Nail
Type: Gel System
Price: 10.40

  • Aprés Nail Gel-X Nail Extensions - Peel Off Liquid Mask 15 mL

  • Protect your fingers from sprays or spills with our Peel Off Liquid Mask!

    Formulated with latex and packaged with a convenient brush, Peel Off Liquid Mask will act as a barrier between your skin and any spill over mess that might happen from your manicure. 

    Apply a thin layer on the skin of the finger around the nail prior to nail design. After you have cured and finished your nail look, simply rub off the mask, leaving your fingers clean of any residue and your nails looking immaculate!

entry.title: Aprés Nail Gel-X Nail Extensions - Jenny Queen of Bling x Apres Gel-X Kit SILVER 7 Piece Set
entry.summary:
Vendor: Aprés Nail
Type: Gel System
Price: 132.95

  • Aprés Nail Gel-X Nail Extensions - Jenny Queen of Bling x Apres Gel-X Kit SILVER 7 Piece Set
  • If you know about Cardi B’s infamously extra nails, then you know Cardi B’s infamously extra nail artist, Jenny Bui. Known as the Queen of Bling, Jenny and Apres have collaborated to bring you the most extra kit to date! Starting from the beautifully holographic case to the box of the longest tips we’ve ever made, this kit includes everything you’ll need to make your extra long, extra bling nail dreams finally come true! 

SET COMES WITH:
-250 piece box of Sculpted Stiletto Extra Extra Extra Long Gel-X Tips (250 pcs for a additional cost)
-15ml Apres pH Bonder
-15ml Apres Non-Acidic Gel Primer
-15ml Apres Soak Off Extend Gel bottle 
-15ml Apres Non-Wipe Top Gelcoat 
-X-Lite LED light
-100/180 grit emery board

entry.title: Aprés Nail Gel-X Nail Extensions - Non-Acidic- Gel- X Prep 15 mL
entry.summary:
Vendor: Aprés Nail
Type: Gel System
Price: 9.45

  • Apres Nail Gel-X Nail Extensions Non-Acidic- Gel- X Prep 15 mL
  • We’ve made the easiest nail extension system even easier!
    With Gel-X Prep, you can ensure maximum adhesion and strength without the trouble of etching the inside of the tip. No more dust, no more extra time. With a quick swipe or two of our non-acid Gel-X Prep, the inside of the tip will be properly chemically etched and ready for Extend Gel application. Gel-X Prep also works to prep the surface of the Gel-X tip after tip application, buffing and texturizing the surface to create the perfect base for color application. We’re not kidding around when we named this one Gel-X Prep! With one product, get ready to be able to perfectly prep the tip for Extend Gel AND perfectly prep the tip for color. Never has one bottle made life and Gel-X so much easier!

entry.title: Aprés Nail Gel-X Nail Extensions - Color Extend Gel In Jar Set of 6
entry.summary:
Vendor: Aprés Nail
Type: Gel System
Price: 123.45

  • Aprés Nail Gel-X Nail Extensions - Color Extend Gel In Jar Set of 6
  • 15 mL each 

  • Bold, sweet, wild, serious, elegant and fun! That’s our girls—Carla, Yesica, Roxie, Insatiable, Sasha, and Ariel. 
    Our new signature color extend gel collection includes a perfect shade for any skin tone and any attitude. Completely formulated from the ground up to create not just the perfect color but the perfect consistency, our new color extend gels can not only be used with our Apres extensions but also as a soft gel overlay.

    • Same formula you already love
    • Easy application/ applicator
    • Easy removal

entry.title: Aprés Nail Gel-X Nail Extensions - Color Extend Gel In Jar - Roxie
entry.summary:
Vendor: Aprés Nail
Type: Gel System
Price: 26.55

  • Aprés Nail Gel-X Nail Extensions - Color Extend Gel In Jar - Roxie
  • 15 mL  

  • Meet Roxie! Don’t let that sweet purple-pink color fool you. Roxie is one part cute, ten parts wild! A bold purple-pink that captures that sweet and sassy inner diva in all of us. Roxie can be used as extend gel with our Apres extensions or as a soft gel overlay. Roxie is that wildcard color you won’t want to be without!
